original_text: God himself also showed clearly that what these people said is true. He did many miracles and powerful things which showed that he was with them. He also helped them with gifts from the Holy Spirit, in the way that he wanted.
korean_text: 하나님도 표적들과 기사들과 여러 가지 능력과 및 자기의 뜻을 따라 성령이 나누어 주신 것으로써 그들과 함께 증언하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: that what these people said is true
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람들이 말한 것이 진실이라는 것을

sentences.original_text: He did many miracles and powerful things
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 많은 기적과 강력한 일들을 행하셨다

sentences.original_text: which showed that he was with them
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그가 그들과 함께 계심을 보여주었다

sentences.original_text: He also helped them with gifts
in the way that he wanted
